POSTS.TITLE: Current Projects
POSTS.DESCRIPTION: What I'll be working on for July and August 2017
POSTS.TEXT:
Current Projects July — August 2017:
Now: Super Saiyan Goku (Frieza Saga)
Upcoming: Full Power Frieza (Frieza Saga)
Katya Volskaya from Overwatch animated short Infiltration
Follow the progress here @BoomR59

POSTS.TITLE: Blender 3D Model: Son Goku from Dragonball Z
POSTS.TEXT: Goku has hands and his upper body is rigged now. He also has mouth internals. However I need to do some cleaning up of his armature weights and redo his armbands. Its coming along very nicely! Follow the progress here @BoomR59

POSTS.TITLE: Blender 3D Model: Son Goku from Dragonball Z
POSTS.TEXT: Using Blender3d and the videos listed below, I've been working on a model of Son Goku from Dragonball Z,specifically the Frieza Saga Super Saiyan Goku. I started the project after seeing ArcSys's Dragonball Fighters Z artstyle and I wanted to learn how they created a game that looks more like the anime than any previous Dragonball title!
